sentences.en: A hundred long years must still elapse before Englishman could hear the name of Oliver Cromwell.
sentences.cn: 离英国人听到奥利弗·克伦姆威尔的名字还有一百年之久呢.

sentences.en: As we enter new century, economic and political situation changed with time elapse.
sentences.cn: 进入新的世纪以来, 世界经济政治格局发生了新的变化.

sentences.en: I cannot let the holidays elapse meaninglessly , my vacation should be a phase of harvest.
sentences.cn: 我不能让假期的到来我的假期 meaninglessly 应该阶段的收成.

sentences.en: I went all out pursuing. I elapse time passage?
sentences.cn: 我拼了命的追. 我逝去的年华、?

sentences.en: Never elapse in the long river of history!
sentences.cn: 在历史的长河中,永不消逝!

sentences.en: Several months elapsed before his case was brought to trial.
sentences.cn: 过了几个月他的案子才开审。

sentences.en: The assignment must be completed within an overall elapsed time of one week.
sentences.cn: 这项任务总的时限为一周，必须按时完成。

sentences.en: Time arrowtime elapse quickly, 50 years extraordinary years blends in historical endless flow.
sentences.cn: 光阴似箭,日月如梭, 50年峥嵘岁月融入历史长河.

sentences.en: Will lose will elapse surely, even if will return, also not like before had no time.
sentences.cn: 失去的必定会逝去, 纵然回归, 也不会如以前无暇.

trans.tran_en: if a particular period of time elapses, it passes
if a particular period of time elapses, it passes
